creategatewayroute.name: CreateGatewayRoute
creategatewayroute.description: Grants permission to create a gateway route that is associated with a virtual gateway

createmesh.name: CreateMesh
createmesh.description: Grants permission to create a service mesh

createroute.name: CreateRoute
createroute.description: Grants permission to create a route that is associated with a virtual router

createvirtualgateway.name: CreateVirtualGateway
createvirtualgateway.description: Grants permission to create a virtual gateway within a service mesh

createvirtualnode.name: CreateVirtualNode
createvirtualnode.description: Grants permission to create a virtual node within a service mesh

createvirtualrouter.name: CreateVirtualRouter
createvirtualrouter.description: Grants permission to create a virtual router within a service mesh

createvirtualservice.name: CreateVirtualService
createvirtualservice.description: Grants permission to create a virtual service within a service mesh

deletegatewayroute.name: DeleteGatewayRoute
deletegatewayroute.description: Grants permission to delete an existing gateway route

deletemesh.name: DeleteMesh
deletemesh.description: Grants permission to delete an existing service mesh

deletemeshpolicy.name: DeleteMeshPolicy
deletemeshpolicy.description: Grants permission to delete the RAM access control policy for a mesh

deleteroute.name: DeleteRoute
deleteroute.description: Grants permission to delete an existing route

deletevirtualgateway.name: DeleteVirtualGateway
deletevirtualgateway.description: Grants permission to delete an existing virtual gateway

deletevirtualnode.name: DeleteVirtualNode
deletevirtualnode.description: Grants permission to delete an existing virtual node

deletevirtualrouter.name: DeleteVirtualRouter
deletevirtualrouter.description: Grants permission to delete an existing virtual router

deletevirtualservice.name: DeleteVirtualService
deletevirtualservice.description: Grants permission to delete an existing virtual service

describegatewayroute.name: DescribeGatewayRoute
describegatewayroute.description: Grants permission to describe an existing gateway route

describemesh.name: DescribeMesh
describemesh.description: Grants permission to describe an existing service mesh

describeroute.name: DescribeRoute
describeroute.description: Grants permission to describe an existing route

describevirtualgateway.name: DescribeVirtualGateway
describevirtualgateway.description: Grants permission to describe an existing virtual gateway

describevirtualnode.name: DescribeVirtualNode
describevirtualnode.description: Grants permission to describe an existing virtual node

describevirtualrouter.name: DescribeVirtualRouter
describevirtualrouter.description: Grants permission to describe an existing virtual router

describevirtualservice.name: DescribeVirtualService
describevirtualservice.description: Grants permission to describe an existing virtual service

getmeshpolicy.name: GetMeshPolicy
getmeshpolicy.description: Grants permission to read the RAM access control policy for a mesh

listgatewayroutes.name: ListGatewayRoutes
listgatewayroutes.description: Grants permission to list existing gateway routes in a service mesh

listmeshes.name: ListMeshes
listmeshes.description: Grants permission to list existing service meshes

listroutes.name: ListRoutes
listroutes.description: Grants permission to list existing routes in a service mesh

listvirtualgateways.name: ListVirtualGateways
listvirtualgateways.description: Grants permission to list existing virtual gateways in a service mesh

listvirtualnodes.name: ListVirtualNodes
listvirtualnodes.description: Grants permission to list existing virtual nodes

listvirtualrouters.name: ListVirtualRouters
listvirtualrouters.description: Grants permission to list existing virtual routers in a service mesh

listvirtualservices.name: ListVirtualServices
listvirtualservices.description: Grants permission to list existing virtual services in a service mesh

putmeshpolicy.name: PutMeshPolicy
putmeshpolicy.description: Grants permission to define the RAM access control policy for a mesh

streamaggregatedresources.name: StreamAggregatedResources
streamaggregatedresources.description: Grants permission to receive streamed resources for an App Mesh endpoint (VirtualNode/VirtualGateway)

updategatewayroute.name: UpdateGatewayRoute
updategatewayroute.description: Grants permission to update an existing gateway route for a specified service mesh and virtual gateway

updatemesh.name: UpdateMesh
updatemesh.description: Grants permission to update an existing service mesh

updateroute.name: UpdateRoute
updateroute.description: Grants permission to update an existing route for a specified service mesh and virtual router

updatevirtualgateway.name: UpdateVirtualGateway
updatevirtualgateway.description: Grants permission to update an existing virtual gateway in a specified service mesh

updatevirtualnode.name: UpdateVirtualNode
updatevirtualnode.description: Grants permission to update an existing virtual node in a specified service mesh

updatevirtualrouter.name: UpdateVirtualRouter
updatevirtualrouter.description: Grants permission to update an existing virtual router in a specified service mesh

updatevirtualservice.name: UpdateVirtualService
updatevirtualservice.description: Grants permission to update an existing virtual service in a specified service mesh
